comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - use attached Java class and report designs
   - preview report in debug mode

expected behavior:

   - scripting event takes effect
   - no exception thrown

actual behavior:

   - rendered report was correct
   - however, there were exception thrown in debug console

it happened when the report was previewed at the first time.

Please add comments when you reassign the bug back. 
Thanks!

Talked with Dazheng before the ressign this bug and he confirmed to set up the debugger environment for the debugger feature and do the investigation since he knows the detail implementation of this feature.

I set up the environment, and there is no error in my computer. But at the computer for the test, the bug reproduces. When preview a empty designfile, no error, but preview a file with the data set, the bug show. From the bug thread dump, you should check the parser, and I can help to set up the environment.

This bug is tricky.Birt Build will generate the web.xml by tomcat using web_template.xml. All parameters in the generated xml should have some sequence. Change the template file so that the valida format web.xml can be generated.
